DataTableColumnDefinition.description: Defines the characteristics of a column in a DataTable element.

sortable.description: Specifies if the column is sortable.

width.description: Specifies the width of the column. Width represents the weight a the column relative to the other columns in the table.

horizontalCellContentAlignment.description: Controls how the content of all cells in the column is horizontally aligned by default. When specified, this value overrides the setting at the table level. When not specified, horizontal alignment is defined at the table, row or cell level.

verticalCellContentAlignment.description: Controls how the content of all cells in the column is vertically aligned by default. When specified, this value overrides the setting at the table level. When not specified, vertical alignment is defined at the table, row or cell level.

ResponsiveDefinition.description: Defines responsive configuration of data table.

width.description: Specifies the width in pixels whe columns are applied.

columns.description: Specifies the list of columns that are displayed.

ActionsDefinition.description: Defines actions that can be triggered of data table row.

icon.description: Specifies the icon that will be shown for action.

type.description: Specifies the type of action that will be shown.

DataTable.description: Provides a way to integrate with various sources and display, sort and filter data in a tabular form.

columns.description: Defines the number of columns in the table, their sizes, and more.

responsive.description: Defines visible columns when column width changes.

actions.description: Defines the actions that can be triggered on data table.

showFilter.description: Specifies whether the header of the data table should be shown.

showHeader.description: Specifies whether the header of the data table should be shown.

showPaginator.description: Specifies whether the paginator of the data table should be shown.

showGridLines.description: Specifies whether grid lines should be displayed.

headerStyle.description: Defines the style of the grid. This property currently only controls the gridâ€™s color.

horizontalCellContentAlignment.description: Controls how the content of all cells is horizontally aligned by default. When not specified, horizontal alignment is defined on a per-cell basis.

verticalCellContentAlignment.description: Controls how the content of all cells is vertically aligned by default. When not specified, vertical alignment is defined on a per-cell basis.
